pages.text: Who is the Black Goat in the Woods? Is she really just an entity somewhere beyond this plane? Probably not; the Murals tell another tale, a tale of two Goats, one Truth and, of course, Thousand Young.

She is next to only the Crawling Chaos in the amount of physical avatars she has, some known ones include Baphomet of the Tempting Flame, Lilith the Mother of Demons, and The Horned Hunter of the Green. She may also appear to cults in a form that is only vaguely expressive of her true form, in order to interact more directly with worshipers.
